mapper.select: SELECT dict_data_id dictDataId, dict_id dictId, name, value, sort, create_id createName, create_time createDate FROM manage_dict_data WHERE dict_id = #{dictId} ORDER BY sort DESC

SELECT mdd.dict_data_id dictDataId, mdd.dict_id dictId, mdd.name, mdd.value, mdd.sort FROM manage_dict md LEFT JOIN manage_dict_data mdd ON md.dict_id = mdd.dict_id WHERE md.field_type = #{fieldType} ORDER BY mdd.sort DESC
